byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

abstract: Brokerage firm BGC Partners, in bid to bolster its real estate division, announces purchase of Computerized Facility Integration, consulting and technology service provider that helps real estate owners manage their assets.
lead_paragraph: Computerized Facility Integration’s software systems help manage properties for a wide range of global companies.

headline.main: BGC Partners Buys Real Estate Consulting Firm

snippet: Computerized Facility Integration’s software systems help manage properties for a wide range of global companies.
